shrimp.name: Trace
shrimp.description: Returns light reaching point P from direction R
shrimp.author: rconstruct

input.name: subset
input.description: Set of objects available for ray computations

shrimp.usage: Returns the incident light reaching a point P from a given direction R. If raytracing isn't supported, trace will return 0. Bias specifies the bias for the ray starting point. Maxdist specifies are distance after which no intersections are checked. If the float version is used, then the distance to the nearest ray intersection is returned instead.
